pages.text: Only affect ice-type spells. Ice spells have 10% reduced cooldown, their level increases by 1, their effects are amplified an additional level, and their effects last 1.5 seconds longer. Affects:$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_paths/path_of_the_equinox)Path of the Equinox $()

pages.mod_text: Your scepter feels cold to the touch. Imbues onto the Frosted Scepter and persists through the Path of the Equinox
